text:
@realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar No doubt, this is all about the ego of pathological liar, corrupt criminal #donaldtrump...trump couldn't care less about the health safety of the cadets. The cowardly 5 time deferment draft dodger is unfit to be commander-in-chief.
#TrumpIsAPos
#Covid19
https://t.co/i23vz1tofD
